c1.name: Unholy Revelation
c1.descriptionraw: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.
c1.description: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

c2.name: Land Without Promise
c2.descriptionraw: The duration of the Ice Lance created by <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color> is increased by 4s.
c2.description: The duration of the Ice Lance created by Rites of Termination is increased by 4s.

c3.name: The Wages of Sin
c3.descriptionraw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Ravaging Confession</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Ravaging Confession by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Painful Grace
c4.descriptionraw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Ravaging Confession</color>'s CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.
c4.description:
Ravaging Confession's CRIT Hits regenerate 5 Energy for Rosaria.
Can only be triggered once each time Ravaging Confession is cast.

c5.name: Last Rites
c5.descriptionraw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Rites of Termination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Divine Retribution
c6.descriptionraw: <color=#FFD780FF>Rites of Termination</color>'s attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.
c6.description: Rites of Termination's attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.
